Sentencas: A multi-physics model coupling electrochemical kinetics with fluid dynamics has been developed to simulate the transport phenomena in mono-block-layer built (MOLB) solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Computational analysis of species transport and electrochemical characteristics of a MOLB-type SOFC

Sentencas: A typical MOLB module is composed of trapezoidal flow channel-, corrugated positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode (PEN) plates, and planar inter-connecters.
Titulo: Computational analysis of species transport and electrochemical characteristics of a MOLB-type SOFC

Sentencas: The control volume-based finite difference method is employed for calculation.
